item.title: React Nginx Flask Docker
item.description: Building a BBS with modern tech stack I want to create project. Decided to use react as front end and flask as backend. Made some mistake before getting my desired requirements: Hot reload when developing Deployment to Azure/GCP/AWS CD/CI set up Docker as description on Kernel Dockerfile is a description on how to creat a process. Logically the process has only one software and the kernel itself. Human Develops vs.
